sentence: Stepan Company ( SCL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 25, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.19 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 15, 2015.
Shareholders who purchased SCL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 5.56% increase over the prior quarter.
At the current stock price of $51.89, the dividend yield is 1.46%.
The previous trading day's last sale of SCL was $51.89, representing a -6.79% decrease from the 52 week high of $55.67 and a 42.79% increase over the 52 week low of $36.34.
SCL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
SCL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $3.03.
Zacks Investment Research reports SCL's forecasted earnings growth in 2015 as 29.96%, compared to an industry average of -3.7%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SCL Dividend History page.
